name: part_008
file: tmp_【 ＃百鬼あやめ生誕祭2023 】Nakiriayame 6th BirthDay  ～Shoot the heart～ [FOai83VIogA]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: Continuation of the performance of 'Haku-Yuki no Princess wa'.
Interval graphics with upbeat background music.
Performance of 'Waza to Azato Expert' featuring guests.

subtitles.original: 見つかるよ
subtitles.english: I'll find you

subtitles.original: ああ...
subtitles.english: Ah...

subtitles.original: お願いKISSで 目を覚まして欲しいの
subtitles.english: Please, wake me up with a kiss

subtitles.original: 白い棺から 連れ出すように
subtitles.english: As if taking me out of a white coffin

subtitles.original: 突き刺さる憎しみは ドラマ的な事情
subtitles.english: The piercing hatred is a dramatic circumstance

subtitles.original: 祈っても 王子様はまだ来ない
subtitles.english: Even if I pray, the prince still hasn't come

subtitles.original: 消えてしまう
subtitles.english: Before I disappear

subtitles.original: その前に...
subtitles.english: Before then...

subtitles.original: なんでいつも そっけないのよ？
subtitles.english: Why are you always so blunt?

subtitles.original: クール気取っちゃって
subtitles.english: Acting all cool

subtitles.original: 会いたいでしょ？ 恋しいでしょ？
subtitles.english: You want to see me, right? You miss me, right?

subtitles.original: 素直になろうよ！
subtitles.english: Let's be honest!

subtitles.original: それなら君の気を引いちゃいます
subtitles.english: Then I'll grab your attention

subtitles.original: ドキドキ溢れる 大作戦♡
subtitles.english: A heart-pounding grand plan♡
1 min, 2 min, 3 min, 4 min...

subtitles.original: ほら既読スルーするんだ LINEを未読スルー
subtitles.english: See, you're leaving me on read, ignoring my LINEs

subtitles.original: 「最近なんか気になって仕方ないんだよなー」
subtitles.english: "Lately, I can't help but find myself interested in you..."

subtitles.original: そんな感じで毎晩ずっと
subtitles.english: Like that, every night, for a long time

subtitles.original: 何度も何度もきっと
subtitles.english: Over and over again, surely

subtitles.original: SNSチェック しちゃうでしょ？
subtitles.english: You check my SNS, don't you?

subtitles.original: ほらもっと夢中に なって！(＞◡＜)
subtitles.english: Come on, get more hooked! (＞◡＜)

subtitles.original: わざとあげた このストーリー
subtitles.english: I posted this Story on purpose

subtitles.original: 君の足跡 チェックするの
subtitles.english: To check your footprints

subtitles.original: あざといなんて 言わないで
subtitles.english: Don't call me calculate-ly cute

subtitles.original: だって Love you Love you Love you 好きだっちゃ！
subtitles.english: Because Love you, Love you, Love you, I like you!

subtitles.original: わざと遅い 既読通知
subtitles.english: A purposefully slow 'read' notification

subtitles.original: 私の心 非公開
subtitles.english: My heart is set to private

subtitles.original: 鍵をかけた 恋心
subtitles.english: A locked-up heart in love

subtitles.original: ねえほらほらほら 私を気にして もっともっと
subtitles.english: Hey look, look, look, pay attention to me more and more

subtitles.original: 私の声で 君が笑うから
subtitles.english: Because my voice makes you laugh

subtitles.original: その瞬間を切り取って 即保存しちゃいたい
subtitles.english: I want to capture that moment and save it instantly

subtitles.original: そのために心 奪っちゃいます
subtitles.english: I'll steal your heart for that reason

subtitles.original: 明日は君の 誕生日
subtitles.english: Tomorrow is your birthday

subtitles.original: 5分 4分 3分 2分
subtitles.english: 5 min, 4 min, 3 min, 2 min

subtitles.original: おめでとうって わざと早まって
subtitles.english: Saying congrats earlier on purpose

subtitles.original: 「ごめん、誰より早く伝えたかったんだ」
subtitles.english: "Sorry, I wanted to tell you before anyone else."

subtitles.original: そんなこと言えば あっという間
subtitles.english: If I say that, in the blink of an eye

subtitles.original: チョコレートみたい 溶けちゃうね
subtitles.english: It'll melt away just like chocolate

subtitles.original: もう早く振り向いて(,,> <,,)
subtitles.english: Come on, turn around already (,,> <,,)

subtitles.original: わざとあざと エキスパート
subtitles.english: An expert at being intentionally cute

subtitles.english: Take a look into my heart

subtitles.original: タイムラインは 君ばかり
subtitles.english: My timeline is full of you

subtitles.original: もっと Love you Love you Love you ドキドキキュン！
subtitles.english: More Love you, Love you, Love you, Heart-pounding kyun!

subtitles.original: 君だけに 限定公開
subtitles.english: A limited-release just for you

subtitles.original: 足跡つくの 待ってるのに
subtitles.english: Even though I'm waiting for your footprints

subtitles.original: このまま行けば ログアウト

subtitles.english: I finally saw it

subtitles.original: 君のアカウントを
subtitles.english: Your account

subtitles.original: やっぱり君も
subtitles.english: Just as I thought, you

subtitles.original: 私を好きなんだね
subtitles.english: Love me too, don't you?

subtitles.original: わざと全部君のためなんだから
subtitles.english: Because I did it all for you on purpose

subtitles.original: 落ちちゃえばいいんだ
subtitles.english: You should just fall for me

subtitles.original: だけど私 少し反省
subtitles.english: But I'm reflecting a little

subtitles.original: あまり試すの 良くないね
subtitles.english: Testing you too much isn't good

subtitles.english: Still, Love you, Love you, Love you, I like you!
